snippet: A man who was angry about a photo of his girlfriend on Facebook took revenge against the former boyfriend who posted it.
abstract: Kenneth W Smith Jr is arrested on charges of making a false threat to Philadelphia police, telling authorities that romantic rival Christopher Shell was carrying liquid explosives on a US Airways flight bound for Dallas; hoax call set off a terrorism scare that ended with flight returning to Philadelphia and Shell being removed at gunpoint.
lead_paragraph: A man who was angry about a photo of his girlfriend on Facebook took revenge against the former boyfriend who posted it.
